doc:
Hannah Leder https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hannah_Leder 0 Hannah Leder (born September 28, 1986) is an American film actress. Born in Los Angeles, California, she is the daughter of director Mimi Leder and actor Gary Werntz. As a child actress she appeared in the films The Peacemaker (1997), Deep Impact (1998) and Pay It Forward (2000), all of which were directed by her mother Mimi Leder. She also guest starred in the television series Shameless, Dads, Bad Judge, Revenge and The Comeback. In 2007, she worked as a costume assistant on the television series Shark. Hannah_Leder ( born September_28_,_1986 ) is an_American_film_actress . Born in Los_Angeles , California , she is the_daughter of director_Mimi_Leder and actor_Gary_Werntz . As a_child_actress she appeared in the_films The_Peacemaker_(_1997_)_,_Deep_Impact_(_1998_) and Pay It Forward ( 2000_) , all of which were_directed by her_mother_Mimi_Leder . She also guest starred in the_television_series_Shameless_,_Dads_,_Bad_Judge , Revenge and The_Comeback . In 2007 , she worked as a_costume_assistant on the_television_series_Shark .
